tool_description: An API showing all the latest News of the Israel/Palestine conflict from Independent American News sources. (More will be added in the future)
name: Independent News LIVE
title: Independent News LIVE

api_list.name: Get Individual News Sources
api_list.description: Get news about Israel/Palestine from a specific source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://independent-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/democracynow"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "independent-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://independent-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "independent-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about Israel/Palestine from all of the saved news sources.
